transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I need to cancel an upcoming physical therapy appointment.

transcript.text: Understood. I'll help you with that. You please provide your date of birth?

transcript.text: Great.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thanks.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Would you like me to look up your record?

transcript.speaker: agent

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm. I have your phone number as four one five five five five zero four six seven. And your date of birth as November eleventh two thousand. Is that correct?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's correct.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I can't proceed further right now, but I can make sure our clinic support team follows up with you. Please hold on while I document your request for them.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Alright, can I get a confirmation that this is cancelled once it's processed?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Live transfer is not a

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Okay, no problem. I'll wait for the follow-up. Thank you.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it. The clinic support team will follow-up with you as soon as they can to confirm your cancellation. Do you need anything else? Just let us know.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: No, that's all. Thank you for your help. Goodbye!
